roleset.name: conform to
roleset.note: ABIDE-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry. Fncls Compliance. (from abide.01-v)

example.name: lacking a clever title
example.text: Saturday, he amended his remarks to say that [he]-1 would continue *trace*-1 to abide by the cease-fire if the U.S. ends its financial support for the Contras.
